function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High occupancy density in classes and the building, leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential outbreak of contagious diseases within the building, affecting occupants and staff.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, reducing occupancy density, and improving ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV-C disinfection, and smart occupancy monitoring.","People":"Occupants, staff, and visitors to the building.","Owner":"Building management and health authorities."}]}
